ygData.subject: RE: Boots/glove soluske quest
ygData.msgSnippet: I think the quest had the locations switched around, just make sure you do an identify on the scepters before you hand them in.  I did the boot quest the other
ygData.messageBody:
I think the quest had the locations switched around, just make sure you do
an identify on the scepters before you hand them in. I did the boot quest
the other night with no problems.

As long as the robe quest is not screwed up, I'll be happy. Breaking into
the area with the nokta shaman for a couple of 31 level necros is kinda hard
for the globe of shadows. Luckily we found a high level nec to help after a
couple of hours. It still took a few hours though to get 3 globes for me
and the 2 other necs in the group.

Now if the shadowmen would drop our items a little more, dropped 1 eye in
about 3 or 4 hours, and a couple of scythes. They dropped quite a bit more
for other quests in that time; gloves or something for enchanters, rapiers,
glowing stones or something like, wizard patch?? etc.

-----Original Message-----
From: Trizzen Do'Trevan [mailto:trizzen@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 10:13 AM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Boots/glove soluske quest


From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>

Has anyone actually figured out the problems with
these quests?

And why in the world, when I identify the spectre from
mistmoore, does it say spectre of sorrow when the NPC
says get the spectre of tears from mist and spectre of
shadows from guk?

Darkmoon Somberlight

=====

This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
